content.webTitle: Populist: Items of interest this week

fields.headline: Populist: Items of interest this week
fields.bodyText: 'Bitch got a dancing horse' Snoop Lion explains why he won't be voting for Romney. Check it out here. Jean meanie After boycotting Levi's for "glorifying revolution" in one of its ads, Fox News nutjob Glenn Beck has launched his own all-American denim line. Nine Inch u-turns The formerly self-sufficient Trent Reznor has returned to a major label because he wasn't seeing his records in overseas stores. Well, duh. Not Wright now Don't expect to see Edgar Wright's Ant Man any time soon; Marvel has set a frankly barmy November 2015 release for the superhero flick. Draw something Gamers are understandably excited about early clips from surreal and beautiful maze platformer The Unfinished Swan, in which you navigate a blank world by chucking paint about. Willoughby or won't she Surprise Surprise is back, but will new presenter Holly Willoughby attempt Cilla's show-stopping closing rendition of the theme tune? Here's hoping. Carrie the two The teaser trailer for the Carrie remake gives us a tanatlising glimpse of Chloë Moretz in the blood-stained title role. Watch it here. guardianguide.tumblr.com twitter.com/guideguardian
